title: Unpacking UPX OSX files
content:
I was wondering if someone could provide me an UPX unpacker, which works with unix excutable files.

I've tried a bunch of already, but all of those expect .EXE's which obviously won't work for me.

Thanks

answers_data.content:
Unless the binary has been modified to prevent it, UPX itself should be able to unpack it:

upx -d packed.bin
